mapper.select: SELECT ama.id AS id, ama.code AS CODE, ama.name AS NAME, ama.brief AS brief, ama.description AS description, ama.start_Time AS startTime, ama.end_Time AS endTime, ama.activity_Type AS activityType, ama.activity_Type_Name AS activityTypeName, ama.promotion_Type_Code AS promotionTypeCode, ama.status AS STATUS, ama.related_Task_Id AS related_Task_Id, ama.initiator AS initiator, ama.sequence AS sequence, ama.activity_Url AS activityUrl, ama.page_Img_Url AS pageImgUrl, ama.top_Img_Url AS topImgUrl, ama.is_Recommend AS isRecommend, ama.creator AS creator, ama.gmt_Create AS gmtCreate, ama.modifier AS MODIFIER, ama.gmt_Modified AS gmtModified, ama.is_Deleted AS isDeleted, ama.activity_Scope_Type AS activityScopeType, ama.activity_Participant_Type AS activityParticipantType, ama.pay_Type AS payType, ama.pre_Start_Time AS preStartTime, ama.pre_End_Time AS preEndTime, ama.tail_Pay_Start_Time AS tailPayStartTime, ama.tail_Pay_End_Time AS tailPayEndTime, ama.advance_Pay_Amount AS advancePayAmount, ama.participate_Num AS participateNum, ama.deliver_Start_Time AS deliverStartTime, ama.deliver_End_Time AS deliverEndTime FROM act_marketing_activity ama WHERE 1=1 and ama.is_deleted = '0' AND ama.id=#{marketingActivityId}
